page.title: 04UPPER CULTULLICH FARM
page.content:
Mr.S.Pepper runs a{small farm,interest {holidays}dealing in the{local {environment}and is the northern representative for the{World Wildlife {Fund. An example of a day in his life would be sorting sheep,digging the garden, repairing the house and making preparations for an'interest holiday'.
He is concerned that{farming}is run{on a{large scale depriving opportunities to many people to develop small holdings and have more control over their lives.
His involvement with local wild life is such that certain information was not available to the survey.
